formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: $$\textbf{Gamete probabilities per gene:}\quad P(\text{allele }X)=\begin{cases} 1 & \text{if homozygous }(XX \text{ or } xx)\\ \tfrac{1}{2} & \text{if heterozygous }(Xx \text{ or } xX) \end{cases}$$ $$\textbf{Offspring genotype probability (one gene):}\quad P(G)=\sum_{g_1\in \mathcal{G}_1}\sum_{g_2\in \mathcal{G}_2} \mathbf{1}[\mathrm{combine}(g_1,g_2)=G]\; P(g_1)\,P(g_2)$$ $$\textbf{Independence across genes (dihybrid):}\quad P(G_{AB})=P(G_A)\cdot P(G_B)$$ $$\textbf{Phenotype rule (complete dominance):}\quad \text{Dominant phenotype if genotype contains at least one uppercase allele; otherwise recessive.}$$
